extendedInfo.description: Speak a contact to make a call, send a message, send an email or view contact information.MUST HAVE INTERNET CONNECTION FOR CONNECTING THE GOOGLE SEARCH ENGINE.The easiest way for dialing, especially while driving.Talk with your friends without searching them in the contacts list, but find them with your voice.Just say a contact name or part of it and the application will recognize your voice and give you the options to call, send message or send email to this contact in only one click.You can configure the user interface according to your needs, all options are available by default: make a call, send SMS and send email.Be aware of the fact that before talking a contact you must record yourself in a noiseless area, and speak clearly.Make sure your voice recognition is well configured to your language, it can be changed at the setting scope, sometimes there are few options for one language, try all of them in order to get the best recognition results.The supported languages are:Arabic BulgarianCatalan Czech Dutch EnglishFinnish FrenchGermanHebrew Hungarian ItalianJapaneseKoreanNorwegian-BokmolPolishPortuguese Romanian RussianSlovak SpanishSwedishTurkishTAGS: [voice call | hands free | voice dial | dialing | calling | phone voice | phone | speak voice]

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: Works well. I\'ve been trying to find a good voice dialer and this one seems the best so far. The only problem I have is that my phone doesn\'t recognise the app as a voice dialer app, when I try using it using my Bluetooth hands-free blueant
reviews.author: Michael Pereira

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Worked flawlessly for me, I like the direct connection to a pre selected number for multi number contacts or a straight single number contact....Galaxy Nexus, JBSourcery Ver.4.5 Rom....(no stock dialer)
reviews.author: Monty Shipman

reviews.title: Great App !
reviews.comment: Love this ! It is so good ! The only issue, which I am told is being addressed for the next version, is that the Auto-Dial feature, which  functions when there is only one matching contact, does not kick in if your required contact exists in both the phone and SIM card contact lists.  The ability to specify the required contact list location(s) will make this app almost perfect !
reviews.author: Steve Mangan

reviews.title: Can\'t Select Home, Mobile, Work
reviews.comment: Name recognition works well but I can\'t specify which phone number for the contact I want to call. e.g. Work, Home, Mobile.  I should be able to say, \"Call John Smith on Mobile\" but I cannot.
reviews.author: Rob Garneau

reviews.title: WORKS!!
reviews.comment: Love this was wishing I could just search contacts by speaking and then found this app! Use it a lot a lil room for improvement but all and all a solid app.
reviews.author: Ryan Crumpton

reviews.title: Great program
reviews.comment: This progr does what they declare. The most important thing is that theprogram is multi lengual when searching contacts.
reviews.author: Arie Cuk

reviews.title: Thee best
reviews.comment: I have tried 3 different voice dialers including the one included in my Samsung. W out a doubt this is the easiest..fastest and mist accurate of them all.
reviews.author: Joel Bernstein

reviews.title: Almost useless
reviews.comment: To be really useful it should say the name of the contact it found and also make it possible to call that contact by a voice command. (It can auto-dial, but since the matching is unreliable (and it doesn\'t say who it found) this feature is useless.) As it is now it simply saves one or two taps every now and then, making it mostly a useless gimmick.
reviews.author: Marcus Sundman

reviews.title: Why Did I Not Know About This App!
reviews.comment: Boy if you\'re a frequent dialer like me you\'ve got to try this app.  It\'s simple, clean and easy to use.  It saves so many steps to give any contact a call.  It also saves time setting up your phone to send a text.  I see some users here say it doesn\'t work with bluetooth.  I wear a bluetooth almost 100% of the time and so far Speak2Call works perfectly.  I\'ve shared this app with friends and family who\'ve also downloaded it and like me said, where\'s this thing been all my life!!  Great job!!
reviews.author: Jerry Hinson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you this is what I\'ve been looking for May the Lord bless you
reviews.author: SIMCHA ADLER

reviews.title: Chester the Jamaican
reviews.comment: Top of the top  for htc evo 4. There is no other way to describe this but it is excellent. (A me fe tell you )
reviews.author: Chester Coke

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work through bluetooth headset
reviews.comment: No point if I can\'t use my bluetooth to call!
reviews.author: Simon Smailus

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Brilliant. Best voice dialer I have seen so far.
reviews.author: Trevor R Brunwin

reviews.title: worthless
reviews.comment: needs to work, first. then needs to open via bluetooth button.
reviews.author: jeffrey thurgood

reviews.title: Not hands free
reviews.comment: Requires too many clicks for a \'voice dialer\'
reviews.author: Oleg Tikhonov

reviews.title: Couldn\'t handle
reviews.comment: the simple stuff like \'dial dad\'. Do not recommend!  Uninstalling...
reviews.author: Jeff Sapper
